description:
Lum`s adorable cousin Ten comes to town and learns why there are signs about feeding the birds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La jolie maîtresse / Mme Hirondelle et Mme Pingouin
Mail from Space! Ten arrives. / Mrs Swallow & Mrs Peguin
Ten, il bambino dello spazio / Una rondine e un pinguino
Uchuu Yuubin Ten-chan Touchaku! / Tsubame-san to PENGIN-san
宇宙ゆうびん テンちゃん到着! - つばめさんと ペンギンさん
